termination_clause.text: Termination or Expiration      i)    In the event that the Agreement is terminated pursuant to Section            16.a.v due to e-centives' acquisition by an Excite@Home Named            Competitor, or by an entity controlling or controlled by an            Excite@Home Named Competitor, e-centives shall transfer all of its            right, title and interest in and to the Payment-Eligible User Data            to Excite.
